Name: Base Station License, Approval,  Big D Royal Car Service, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Big D Royal Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Big D Royal Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 117-01 Merrick Boulevard in the borough of Queens is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS# 3211
